headline: Is American Electric Power (AEP) Pricing Make Sense After Strong Recent Share Performance?
summary: If you are looking at American Electric Power Company and wondering whether the current share price makes sense, this article walks through what that price might imply about value. The stock last closed at US$132.39, with returns of 1.7% over 7 days, 13.5% over 30 days, 14.3% year to date, 27.1% over 1 year, 68.5% over 3 years and 107.7% over 5 years. These figures give investors a range of data points to consider. Recent news around American Electric Power Company has centered on its role...
